Name: Giuroll
Desc:
### NEW IMPROVED ROLLBACK
**PRE-RELEASE BUILD, VERSION 0.5.5**  
**COMPATIBLE WITH VERSIONS SINCE 0.5.0**  
**0.5.3: FIXED FRAME 1 FREEZE BUG (IF BOTH PLAYERS ARE USING THIS VERSION)**  
**0.5.4: IMPROVED SOUND ROLLBACK**  
**0.5.5: HOTFIX FOR MARISA 2C CAUSING A CRASH**  
This mod fixes any FPS issues related to Windows 10 (most users affected), online mode stuttering, and one-sided rollback.  
  
**It also allows you to rewind replays with the q keys.**  
Installed like any other SWRSToys mod.  
Incompatible with Sokuroll (must be disabled).  
Report any issues to [@Giufin](https://discordapp.com/users/278469240879841280).  
Currently the only known issue is sound being deleted at the end of the round.  
Any other issues, especially freezes and sound related issues, other than the one above should be reported.  
  
**MOST MODS SEEM TO BE COMPATIBLE, EXCEPT DESYNC-PROTECTOR AND HOST-IN-BACKGROUND, BUT IN CASE OF CRASHES OR OTHER ISSUES DISABLE AS MANY MODS AS YOU CAN**  
For more **information**: [https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll](https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll)

Name: Giuroll-62F
Desc:
### NEW IMPROVED ROLLBACK
**PRE-RELEASE BUILD, VERSION 0.5.5**  
**COMPATIBLE WITH VERSIONS SINCE 0.5.0**

This mod fixes any FPS issues related to Windows 10 (most users affected), online mode stuttering, and one-sided rollback.  
  
**It also allows you to rewind replays with the q keys.**  
Installed like any other SWRSToys mod.

Currently the only known issue is sound being deleted at the end of the round.  
Any other issues, especially freezes and sound related issues, other than the one above should be reported.  
  
**MOST MODS SEEM TO BE COMPATIBLE, EXCEPT DESYNC-PROTECTOR AND HOST-IN-BACKGROUND, BUT IN CASE OF CRASHES OR OTHER ISSUES DISABLE AS MANY MODS AS YOU CAN**  
For more **information**: [https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll](https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll)

Name: SokuLobbiesMod
Desc:
Multiplayer online lobby.  
> + Added basic achievements for Soku2 character.  
> + Added Soku2 character in the avatar list, using placeholders.  
> + Added emotes themed over Soku2 characters.  
> + Show the current version of the mod at the bottom right corner in the lobby list menu.  
> + Added the ChatKey option in the ini, allowing to rebind the key used to open the chat.  
> + Added the HostIP option in the ini, allowing to change the IP used to host.  
> + Added documention in the ini toe explain what the options do.  
> + Added a shadow to the text in the chat.  
> + Added cards stats back.  
> + Allow to chat in game.  
> + Added an achievements.dat for those that don't want to bother with achievements  
> - Fixed a bug causing win/lose/play achievements to be granted randomly.  
> - Fixed a bug causing win/lose/play achievements to be granted on the next game instead.  
> - Fixed a bug causing the avatars to glitch out in the customize avatar screen if leaving a lobby while in an elevator.  
> - Fixed a bug causing the hostlist arcade machine to stay open in the background after leaving a game from the hostlist.  
> - Fixed issues displaying names for lobbies containing non-english characters.  
> - Fixed issues displaying profile names containing non-english characters in the chat.  
> - Fixed issues when using cards and a rollback occurs.  
> - Fixed a bug causing the game to crash when coming back from a game while having been disconnected from the lobby you were currently in.  
> - Fixed a bug causing the game to start hosting when joining/spectating someone while having the AcceptHostlist option set to 1.  
> - Fixed a few bugs causing the lobby server to crash.  
> - No longer play the crush sound when disconnected from a lobby if not inside the lobby list menu.

Name: Autopunch
Desc: This program lets you host & connect to friends to play peer-to-peer games without having to open or redirect any port. This does not add any latency to the connection compared to redirecting ports manually.

Name: SWRSokuRoll
Desc: The Roll Mod used in SokuReplay ranked battles.

Name: InGameHostlist
Desc:
A module that adds hostlist bot integration directly into Hisoutensoku.  
> Added localization support through th123intl.  
> Localization files can be found in ./localization, and should be added to the intl pack to use.  
> Doesn't support non-ascii characters.  
>   
> Thanks to Čchārah for the Livvi Karelian translation.

Name: SokuModLoader
Desc: Necessary tool for injecting mods into games.

Name: InfiniteDecks
Desc:
Removes the 4 decks limit in Touhou 12.3  
> Fixed bug causing specs to send wrong P2 deck

Name: shady-loader
Desc:
A specific fighting game resource manipulation tools  
  
> Changelog:  
>  - Changed mod server to the one owned by Pinky's
>  - Fix path names for some locales
